MESSAGE.JP: 知ってる？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Did you know?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Did you know?

MESSAGE.JP: くのひとは忘れているけれど、願いが叶うことが幸せとは限らない。
MESSAGE.EN: A lot of people forget it, but having your wish granted does not always mean happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: A lot of people forget it, but having your wish granted does not always mean happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: っと願っているだけのほうがいいことだって、ある。
MESSAGE.EN: Sometimes it's better to just keep on wishing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sometimes it's better to just keep on wishing.

MESSAGE.JP: の望みが、その願いが、その夢が――。
MESSAGE.EN: That desire, that wish, that dream...
MESSAGE.Translation: That desire, that wish, that dream...

MESSAGE.JP: 分自身を傷つけることになるなんて誰も思いもよらないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody thinks that it will hurt them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody thinks that it will hurt them.

MESSAGE.JP: んだ手だって、いつか離れる日もあるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That the hand holding theirs will some day let go.
MESSAGE.Translation: That the hand holding theirs will some day let go.

MESSAGE.JP: わした言葉だって、いつか忘れる日もくるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That the words they've exchanged will some day be forgotten.
MESSAGE.Translation: That the words they've exchanged will some day be forgotten.

MESSAGE.JP: 望んで得た物を、望んで手放すことだって、あるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That the things they longed for and obtained will be lost.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That the things they longed for and obtained will be lost.

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ、夢見ていたころのほうが、幸せだったな、と。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I was happier when I was dreaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I was happier when I was dreaming.

MESSAGE.JP: う思う日がいつか来るかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: A day may come when they think that.
MESSAGE.Translation: A day may come when they think that.

MESSAGE.JP: は、現実になってしまえば、夢じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: If a dream becomes reality, it's no longer a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: If a dream becomes reality, it's no longer a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、ただの。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just...

MESSAGE.JP: 実だ。
MESSAGE.EN: reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: reality.

MESSAGE.JP: たり前のことが、心を苛む。
MESSAGE.EN: It's only natural, but it's torture to the heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's only natural, but it's torture to the heart.

MESSAGE.JP: っそ夢を見続けていられたら、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: They think it'd have been better to keep on dreaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: They think it'd have been better to keep on dreaming.

MESSAGE.JP: つのまにか、そう考えていた『私』。
MESSAGE.EN: At some point ❛I❜ thought that.
MESSAGE.Translation: At some point ❛I❜ thought that.

MESSAGE.JP: つからかは覚えていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't remember when it started.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't remember when it started.

MESSAGE.JP: 識のはじまりがいつからか、と問われて。
MESSAGE.EN: If you asked when their memories began,
MESSAGE.Translation: If you asked when their memories began,

MESSAGE.JP: えられるひとがいないように。
MESSAGE.EN: there's no one who could answer you.
MESSAGE.Translation: there's no one who could answer you.

MESSAGE.JP: の先はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing beyond.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing beyond.

MESSAGE.JP: の先はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing before.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing before.

MESSAGE.JP: から――。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why...

MESSAGE.JP: ―扉から乗り込み、ステップを踏むところから始まる夢を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...the dream started when I walk through the door and took that first step.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...the dream started when I walk through the door and took that first step.

MESSAGE.JP: れていく窓の外。
MESSAGE.EN: It passed by outside the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: It passed by outside the window.

MESSAGE.JP: スファルトだけ窓から見つめている。
MESSAGE.EN: I just stared at the asphalt outside the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just stared at the asphalt outside the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 内の喧噪から外れて、ひとり一番前の席でぼんやり外を眺めている。
MESSAGE.EN: Disconnected from the tumult inside the car, I just stared outside from the front seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Disconnected from the tumult inside the car, I just stared outside from the front seat.

MESSAGE.JP: れは区切りのひとつだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a point of disconnect.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a point of disconnect.

MESSAGE.JP: にもかも失う私が触れる最後の『外』。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the last ❛outside❜ that I, who lost everything, would experience.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the last ❛outside❜ that I, who lost everything, would experience.

MESSAGE.JP: 期の王、という話を思い出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I remember a story called ❛The King's Last Days.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I remember a story called ❛The King's Last Days.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 日七晩続いた宴のあとに殺される王の身代わりになった道化のお話。
MESSAGE.EN: It's the story of a jester who was killed in place of the king after he partied for 7 days and nights.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's the story of a jester who was killed in place of the king after he partied for 7 days and nights.

MESSAGE.JP: 化にとっては悲劇だが、みなにとっては喜劇のお話。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a tragedy for the jester, but a comedy for everyone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a tragedy for the jester, but a comedy for everyone else.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「下手くそなカラオケね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm absolutely terrible at karaoke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm absolutely terrible at karaoke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: く。
MESSAGE.EN: I whisper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I whisper.

MESSAGE.JP: の呟きと同時に、いつも音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: As I do, there is the usual sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I do, there is the usual sound.

MESSAGE.JP: きな音。
MESSAGE.EN: A loud sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: A loud sound.

MESSAGE.JP: ても、大きな音…。
MESSAGE.EN: Very loud...
MESSAGE.Translation: Very loud...

MESSAGE.JP: その音で、目が覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wake up to the sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wake up to the sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 覚ましを止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turn off my alarm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turn off my alarm.

MESSAGE.JP: ーテンの隙間から零れる光。
MESSAGE.EN: Light spills in from between the curtains.
MESSAGE.Translation: Light spills in from between the curtains.

MESSAGE.JP: っくりと体を起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly wake myself up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly wake myself up.

MESSAGE.JP: が重たい。
MESSAGE.EN: My head feels heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: My head feels heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: に打たれた髪の毛のせいだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is it because my hair is wet from the rain?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it because my hair is wet from the rain?

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「…濡れてない、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...It's not wet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...It's not wet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: でさわる自分の髪は、濡れてなどいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I touch my hair with my hands and find it dry.
MESSAGE.Translation: I touch my hair with my hands and find it dry.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝起きるたびに、自分がどこかへ行ってしまいそうで怖い。
MESSAGE.EN: Every morning when I wake up, I'm scared I may have gone somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every morning when I wake up, I'm scared I may have gone somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を動かしてじっと見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I move my hands and stare at them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I move my hands and stare at them.

MESSAGE.JP: わりと視界が歪む。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision blurs.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision blurs.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「……っ」
びだしたくなるようなそんな気持ちを押し殺す。
MESSAGE.EN: I suppress the urge to let out a scream.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suppress the urge to let out a scream.

MESSAGE.JP: 度も、何度も、何度も。
MESSAGE.EN: Over and over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Over and over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: っと昔から握り続けてきた石をイメージする。
MESSAGE.EN: I imagine the stone that I've always carried since long ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: I imagine the stone that I've always carried since long ago.

MESSAGE.JP: ちこち尖った重たい石。
MESSAGE.EN: That heavy pointy stone.
MESSAGE.Translation: That heavy pointy stone.

MESSAGE.JP: と、泥で汚れた汚い石。
MESSAGE.EN: That stone covered in blood and dirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: That stone covered in blood and dirt.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれを自分に対して振り下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: I would bring it down on myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would bring it down on myself.

MESSAGE.JP: り下ろす対象の自分は、いつも幼い顔をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The me I brought it down on always had a very young appearance.
MESSAGE.Translation: The me I brought it down on always had a very young appearance.

MESSAGE.JP: かを信じるように、私を見上げている。
MESSAGE.EN: She would look up at me like she had faith in something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She would look up at me like she had faith in something.

MESSAGE.JP: んっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam*.

MESSAGE.JP: から、その石を振り下ろして頭に叩きつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: So I would bring the stone down and slam it into her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I would bring the stone down and slam it into her head.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃり、と。
MESSAGE.EN: *Crack*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crack*.

MESSAGE.JP: がする。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound was audible.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound was audible.

MESSAGE.JP: 抗することなく、幼い自分は倒れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The young me couldn't resist and would collapse.
MESSAGE.Translation: The young me couldn't resist and would collapse.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも私は石を振り下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I brought down the stone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I brought down the stone.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃぐしゃ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: *Crack*, *crack*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crack*, *crack*.

MESSAGE.JP: た嫌な音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: That unpleasant sound again.
MESSAGE.Translation: That unpleasant sound again.

MESSAGE.JP: 回も、何回も、何回も。
MESSAGE.EN: Over and over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Over and over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: ころに。
MESSAGE.EN: My heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: My heart.

MESSAGE.JP: もちに。
MESSAGE.EN: My emotions.
MESSAGE.Translation: My emotions.

MESSAGE.JP: ましいに。
MESSAGE.EN: My soul.
MESSAGE.Translation: My soul.

MESSAGE.JP: いて、壊れるまで叩いて、潰れるまで叩いて。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd beat them, beat them until they broke, beat them into nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd beat them, beat them until they broke, beat them into nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: り返すことに意味があるのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was there meaning in repeating that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there meaning in repeating that?

MESSAGE.JP: 死に『いま』を維持し続けることに何の意味が？
MESSAGE.EN: Is there some meaning in desperately preserving the ❛now❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is there some meaning in desperately preserving the ❛now❜?

MESSAGE.JP: り、静かに、泣いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I cry silently, alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cry silently, alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 分のベッドから出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I get out of bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I get out of bed.

MESSAGE.JP: のベッドに腰掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: And sit on the bed next to mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: And sit on the bed next to mine.

MESSAGE.JP: ている彼女を起こさないようにそっと、静かに。
MESSAGE.EN: Quietly, so as not to wake the girl sleeping there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Quietly, so as not to wake the girl sleeping there.

MESSAGE.JP: 日が始まる…。
MESSAGE.EN: The day has begun...
MESSAGE.Translation: The day has begun...

MESSAGE.JP: の日以外は、私のほうがクドリャフカより早起きだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Except on rainy days, I always wake up before Kudryavka.
MESSAGE.Translation: Except on rainy days, I always wake up before Kudryavka.

MESSAGE.JP: 陽が昇る前に目が覚めてしまう癖がついているから。
MESSAGE.EN: I have gotten in the habit of waking up before the sun comes up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have gotten in the habit of waking up before the sun comes up.

MESSAGE.JP: ややかな亜麻色髪をシーツの上で波打たせている彼女。
MESSAGE.EN: Her beautiful flax colored hair undulates on top of the sheets.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her beautiful flax colored hair undulates on top of the sheets.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「また、辛い夢を見ているの、クドリャフカ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Are you having another bad dream, Kudryavka...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Are you having another bad dream, Kudryavka...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ている彼女は当然答えはしない。
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously the sleeping girl doesn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously the sleeping girl doesn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、彼女の頬にある涙の名残を見ると私は悲しくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: But the streaks on her cheeks from the tears make me sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the streaks on her cheeks from the tears make me sad.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「何度繰り返すのかしらね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝How many times will this go on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝How many times will this go on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は何も出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「後悔だけを紡いで。そこに何があるというんでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Spinning only regrets. There's something to that, isn't there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Spinning only regrets. There's something to that, isn't there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女を救えるのは……誰なのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: The one who will save her... who is it?
MESSAGE.Translation: The one who will save her... who is it?

MESSAGE.JP: なくとも私ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: I, at the very least, know that it isn't me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I, at the very least, know that it isn't me.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、とても悲しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That makes me very sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: That makes me very sad.

MESSAGE.JP: っと頬を撫でる。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently stroke her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently stroke her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: を抱え込んで身を丸めているクドリャフカ。
MESSAGE.EN: She clings to a pillow and curls up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clings to a pillow and curls up.

MESSAGE.JP: の子がこうしているのは、怖い夢を見ているときなのだろう、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I think she does this when she's having a scary dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think she does this when she's having a scary dream.

MESSAGE.JP: がりつくように、枕を抱え込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Clinging to her pillow like it would protect her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Clinging to her pillow like it would protect her.

MESSAGE.JP: 代償行為』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Substitute Behavior.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Substitute Behavior.❜

MESSAGE.JP: んな言葉が頭に浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those words float into my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those words float into my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「…それは、私も同じね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...That's the same as me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...That's the same as me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の子を笑えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't make her smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't make her smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「誰も誰かの代わりになんかなれない、か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Nobody can replace somebody else, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Nobody can replace somebody else, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「ねぇ、クドリャフカ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Hey, Kudryavka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Hey, Kudryavka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「あなたに優しいのはあの子の代わりのつもり、って言ったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If I said I was going to be kind to you in place of that person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If I said I was going to be kind to you in place of that person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「あなたは怒ってくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Would you get mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Would you get mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「ひどい偽善」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm such a hypocrite.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm such a hypocrite.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「自分だけが大事だから取り繕ってるだけだ、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If I said I was putting on appearances because I only care about myself,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If I said I was putting on appearances because I only care about myself,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「怒ってくれるかしら…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Would you get mad...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Would you get mad...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「そんなわけはないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝There's no way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝There's no way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 像できる。
MESSAGE.EN: I can imagine it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can imagine it.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多さんは嘘つきですねぇ』と。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛You're a liar, Kanata-san.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛You're a liar, Kanata-san.❜

MESSAGE.JP: こにこ笑いながら言うのだろう、多分。
MESSAGE.EN: You'd probably say that and grin.
MESSAGE.Translation: You'd probably say that and grin.

MESSAGE.JP: ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not a lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not a lie.

MESSAGE.JP: れど本当でもない。
MESSAGE.EN: But it's not the truth either.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it's not the truth either.

MESSAGE.JP: とそうでないものの区別は日々の中で曖昧になってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I say it's not a lie, but the distinction is getting vaguer by the day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I say it's not a lie, but the distinction is getting vaguer by the day.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「…ごめんね、クドリャフカ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...Sorry, Kudryavka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...Sorry, Kudryavka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「私が神さまだったら、無かったことにしてあげられるのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If I was God, I would make it all go away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If I was God, I would make it all go away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「奇跡が起こって…過去の悲しいことが全部無くなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'd create a miracle... and make all your past sadness go away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'd create a miracle... and make all your past sadness go away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「私たちは最初から幸福だった、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝We would be blessed with happiness from the start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝We would be blessed with happiness from the start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「そう信じさせてくれたら良かったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝If only I could make you believe that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝If only I could make you believe that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「…でも。そんな奇跡なんかないって、私たちは知ってる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...But we know that no such miracles exist...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...But we know that no such miracles exist...❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから、あったものは、何があろうと起こる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's why what was, was bound to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's why what was, was bound to be.

MESSAGE.JP: ―『あったこと』を変えられない、という規律（ルール）。
MESSAGE.EN: ――A rule that you can't change ❛past events.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ――A rule that you can't change ❛past events.❜

MESSAGE.JP: かったものは、暗闇の中に消えていくしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: What wasn't, must disappear into darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: What wasn't, must disappear into darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: ―『なかったこと』は失われる、という方程式。
MESSAGE.EN: ――An equation that states ❛past possibilities❜ are lost.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――An equation that states ❛past possibilities❜ are lost.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に言うともなく、私は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I whisper like I'm not really talking to anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I whisper like I'm not really talking to anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: は傍観者で脇役でしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I can only play the role of a bystander.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can only play the role of a bystander.

MESSAGE.JP: の手はひどく小さく無力なままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My hands are terribly small and powerless.
MESSAGE.Translation: My hands are terribly small and powerless.

MESSAGE.JP: の子のためにしてきたことは、全部間違っているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything I've done for her has been a mistake.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything I've done for her has been a mistake.

MESSAGE.JP: っと正しい方法があるのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was probably a better way.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was probably a better way.

MESSAGE.JP: 用に立ち回って、上手くやれたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I probably could have conducted myself better and done a better job.
MESSAGE.Translation: I probably could have conducted myself better and done a better job.

MESSAGE.JP: も、全部言い訳だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But those are all excuses.
MESSAGE.Translation: But those are all excuses.

MESSAGE.JP: きなかったという結果が全て。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything has ended with me being incapable.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything has ended with me being incapable.

MESSAGE.JP: の結果を前にして、全部許して貰えるはずがなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Considering the result, I probably won't be forgiven for it all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Considering the result, I probably won't be forgiven for it all.

MESSAGE.JP: るいことは、わるいこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Bad things are bad things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bad things are bad things.

MESSAGE.JP: るいことをしたら、もう、なれないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If you do bad things, you lose your chance.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you do bad things, you lose your chance.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「もう、なれないんだ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I've lost my chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I've lost my chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の機会は永遠に失われた。
MESSAGE.EN: That opportunity has been lost forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: That opportunity has been lost forever.

MESSAGE.JP: う取り戻せない。
MESSAGE.EN: There is no getting it back.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is no getting it back.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとがひとを救えるはずなどないのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...People can't save each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...People can't save each other.

MESSAGE.JP: のままでいることすら大変なのに、その先が私には見えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's hard to be as I am, but I can't see beyond that.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's hard to be as I am, but I can't see beyond that.

MESSAGE.JP: へ進むことが大事？
MESSAGE.EN: It's important to move forward?
MESSAGE.Translation: It's important to move forward?

MESSAGE.JP: 葉では、なんとでも言える。
MESSAGE.EN: That's easier said than done.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's easier said than done.

MESSAGE.JP: れが強さだって、そんなこと、わかってる。
MESSAGE.EN: I know they say that's strength.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know they say that's strength.

MESSAGE.JP: も、こんな小さな手に何ができるものか。
MESSAGE.EN: But can I do it with these tiny hands?
MESSAGE.Translation: But can I do it with these tiny hands?

MESSAGE.JP: きない。
MESSAGE.EN: No.
MESSAGE.Translation: No.

MESSAGE.JP: にはできない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't.

MESSAGE.JP: められるままの歯車のままでいる私にはそんなことできない。
MESSAGE.EN: I, a necessary cog, can't do such a thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I, a necessary cog, can't do such a thing.

MESSAGE.JP: しいことばかり起こる舞台。それが続けば笑うしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm in a setting where only bad things happen. As long as that continues, all I can do is smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm in a setting where only bad things happen. As long as that continues, all I can do is smile.

MESSAGE.JP: も笑い続けることは、やっぱり悲しいことなのかもしれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But continuing to smile might be a sad thing too.
MESSAGE.Translation: But continuing to smile might be a sad thing too.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「自己犠牲に酔ってる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm drunk on the idea of self-sacrifice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm drunk on the idea of self-sacrifice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「最低ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝I'm the worst.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝I'm the worst.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「…ほんとうに…最低ね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...the absolute... worst...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...the absolute... worst...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んとうにクドリャフカを笑えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I really can't make Kudryavka smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really can't make Kudryavka smile.

MESSAGE.JP: えない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't...

MESSAGE.JP: た始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: It starts again.
MESSAGE.Translation: It starts again.

MESSAGE.JP: 面を付けて、こころの無い人形のように、踊る私。
MESSAGE.EN: I put on a mask and dance like a soulless puppet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put on a mask and dance like a soulless puppet.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪で、嫌われるだけの、二木佳奈多の生活が。
MESSAGE.EN: That is the life of the ugly, hated Kanata Futaki.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is the life of the ugly, hated Kanata Futaki.

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佳奈多@「…ほんとうに、ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kanata@❝...I'm truly... sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kanata@❝...I'm truly... sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のしていることを、誰も許してくれなくていいから…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's fine if no one forgives what I am doing...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's fine if no one forgives what I am doing...

MESSAGE.JP: うやって呟くことぐらいは、認めてほしい、と、私は、思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I think my whispering like that is a cry for acceptance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think my whispering like that is a cry for acceptance.
